channel.title: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?
channel.description: How do I make it so in p16 you cant just keep clicking on a npc or a player and you hit as fast as you click? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?
item.dc:creator: @whalens42 whalens42
item.description:
@whalens42 wrote:

I dont get it so you want me to add this

if(something) { if(timer == 0) { sendMessage("you can now attack/whatever"); timer = 10; //would be 5 seconds } else { sendMessage("you need to wait 5 seconds to do that again"); } } ?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?

item.title: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

nop i made that so it should be 0 all the time so it does like reset all the time like

if(something) {
if(timer == 0) {
sendMessage(“you can now attack/whatever”);
timer = 10; //would be 5 seconds
} else {
sendMessage(“you need to wait 5 seconds to do that again”);
}
}

so that one should be 0 not 500 and 500 would be 250 seconds lol

and you can always rename tiemr to something else and remember if you write it as TiMeR then you must write if (TiMeR == 0)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?

item.title: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?
item.dc:creator: @whalens42 whalens42
item.description:
@whalens42 wrote:

Like this

public int timer = 500;
public boolean process()
if (timer > 500) {timer--;}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so you cant just click and hit fast?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

you make them self otherwise

like this

public int timer = 0; above boolean process

if (timer > 0) {timer--;} in boolean process

usually its 500MS so 2 = 1 second… atleast for me

you can check the time it updates in server.java here on

public static final int cycleTime = 500;
